item.title: This Is Why You Can’t Stop Noticing Your Floaters
item.description:
There’s a reason you keep seeing them.
Even when you try not to.
Even when you know it’s not helping.

“Why can’t I stop noticing my floaters?”

The answer isn’t just “anxiety.”
It’s neuroscience.
It’s reinforcement.
And it’s totally reversible — once you understand the loop.

You’re Not Just Seeing Floaters — You’re Training Your Brain

Let’s get brutally clear:

Every time you notice a floater, react to it, and spiral into thought…
